QueryViewSpec.Name: Sponsorship Commitments With Multiple RG All Rankings Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Sponsorship Commitments With Multiple RG All Rankings Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
-- multiple commitments for same child & sponsor: with commitmentCounts (COMMITMENTLOOKUPID, SPONSORLOOKUPID) as ( SELECT DISTINCT A.COMMITMENTID, A.SPONSORID FROM ( select SC.LOOKUPID AS COMMITMENTID, FT.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID AS RECURRINGGIFTID, c.LOOKUPID as SPONSORID, rank() over (partition by SC.LOOKUPID order by FT.DATE asc) as RECURRINGGIFTCOUNTER from FINANCIALTRANSACTION FT inner join FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM FTLI on FT.ID = FTLI.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID inner join SPONSORSHIP S on FTLI.ID = S.REVENUESPLITID inner join SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT SC on S.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = SC.ID join CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = s.CONSTITUENTID inner join smartfield35EFF8A4CA954D9AA9BA012A8C82C5E3 ESSD on S.CONSTITUENTID = ESSD.ID and ESSD.VALUE >= '1/1/2009' --where -- S.STARTDATE >= '1/1/2009' group by SC.LOOKUPID, FT.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID, FT.DATE, c.LOOKUPID ) A WHERE RECURRINGGIFTCOUNTER >= 1 )
select sc.ID, SPONSORLOOKUPID, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, COMMITMENTLOOKUPID, r.LOOKUPID as REVENUEID, s.STARTDATE, ESSD.VALUE from commitmentCounts cc join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc on sc.LOOKUPID = cc.COMMITMENTLOOKUPID --s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = sc.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID left join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID left join dbo.REVENUE_EXT REX on REX.ID = r.ID -- ft.ID inner join smartfield35EFF8A4CA954D9AA9BA012A8C82C5E3 ESSD on S.CONSTITUENTID = ESSD.ID and ESSD.VALUE >= '1/1/2009'
